intro_para: Young women all over the world feel pressured to fit in with society's expectations. From Siberia to Syria, six teenage girls tell us what it means to be a 'good girl' and also reveal what their lives are really like.
syria_subtitle: To live at risk of barrel bombs in Syria
siberia_subtitle: To be a young Siberian nomad
pakistan_subtitle: To be a good girl in Pakistan
us_subtitle: To be a teenage mum in the USA
congo_subtitle: To be a teenager in DR Congo

meta_title: What does it mean to be a good girl?
meta_description: BBC News looks at what it means to be a good girl in different cultures around the world: Venezuela, Syria, Siberia, Pakistan, the USA and DR Congo.
